author: Dain Evans
title: How Zoom became so popular during social distancing
description: Zoom has risen to the top of the market, thanks to social distancing during the coronavirus pandemic. But privacy concerns have also been rising around Zoom, including "Zoombombing." CNBC explores how Zoom became the go-to platform during the pandemic, how it…
content: With millions of people being forced to stay home to help stop the spread of COVID-19, many have found creative ways to virtually stay social through happy hours, trivia nights and birthday parties. And Zoom, one of the dozens of video conferencing services, … [+914 chars]
